text.__SUMMARY__:
Geranium himalayense (common names Himalayan crane's-bill or lilac cranesbill) is a species of hardy flowering herbaceous perennial plant in the genus Geranium, Geraniaceae family. It is native to the Himalayas, parts of Russia and western China.
It has a  sprawling habit, violet-blue flowers and deeply cut palmate foliage.
